articles.content: Since enlisting in the military in December 2023, BTS‘s Jungkook has remained off social media, only posting a single word for his military graduation. Months into his military service, the idol has … [+687 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive - Adil Khan Durrani: I regret every minute and everyday that I will be remembered as Rakhi Sawant’s ex; she can never give happiness to anyone - The Times of India
articles.description: Rakhi Sawant's ex-husband Adil Khan Durrani, who recently made headlines after he tied the knot to Bigg Boss 12 fame Somi Khan in a private nikaah ceremony in Jaipur on March 3. The businessman from Mysore is enjoying his blissful married life with Somi Khan …
articles.content: Adil: If you talk about my wedding with Rakhi Sawant stands null and void as when we got married she was already married to someone else. Mujhe dhokhe mein rakh ke usne kiya tha. There’s already a co… [+572 chars]

articles.title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu says she was 'forced to go public about' myositis: 'I was very sick back then' - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Samantha Ruth Prabhu said at the India Today Conclave 2024 that she was forced to come out in public and reveal she was suffering from myositis, ahead of her 2022 release Yashoda.
articles.content:
Actor Samantha Ruth Prabhu said that she was forced to come out in public and reveal she was suffering from the autoimmune disorder myositis.
